title: John Legend expecting first child
text:
John Legend expecting first child Tue, 13 Oct 2015 3:48 PM Share Your Email John Legend. AFP 
All of Me singer John Legend and his wife Chrissy Teigen are expecting their first child together. 
The model announced the news on her Instagram account yesterday, and revealed that they had been trying to conceive "for a while now". 
"John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant," revealed Teigen in the Instagram caption. 
"As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family." 
Teigen continues: "We're so excited that it's finally happening. Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx (sic)" A photo posted by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Oct 12, 2015 at 4:55pm PDT 

According to People , it was quite tough for Teigen to conceive as the model revealed her fertility struggles on her talk show, FABlife. 
"John and I were having trouble," Teigen revealed on the show. 
"We would have had kids five, six years ago if it had happened. But my gosh, it's been a process." 
Watch Teigen discuss her past fertility issues below: Staff Reporter
